类 Login

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
Login
直接已知子类:
LoginPassword, LoginSignUp
public class Login extends javafx.application.Application
The Login class represents a JavaFX application for user authentication. It provides functionality for user login, signup, and password management.

The application features:

  • User login with username and password
  • User registration (signup)
  • Password change functionality
  • Password recovery options
  • Credential persistence using CSV file storage
版本:
final
作者:
Xinghan Qin

  • 方法详细资料

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main entry point for the application.
      参数:
      args - Command line arguments

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Initializes and starts the JavaFX application. Sets up the primary stage and loads user credentials.
      指定者:
      start 在类中 javafx.application.Application
      参数:
      primaryStage - The primary stage for this application

    • showLoginScene

      protected void showLoginScene()
      Displays the login scene with username and password fields. Creates and configures all UI components for the login interface.

    • handleLogin

      protected int handleLogin(String username, String password)
      Handles the login process by validating user credentials.
      参数:
      username - The username entered by the user
      password - The password entered by the user
      返回:
      1 for successful login, 0 for empty fields, -1 for invalid credentials

    • loadCredentials

      protected void loadCredentials()
      Loads user credentials from the CSV file. Reads username-password pairs and stores them in the userCredentials map.

    • saveCredentials

      protected void saveCredentials()
      Saves user credentials to the CSV file. Writes all username-password pairs from the userCredentials map to the file.

    • showAlert

      protected void showAlert(String title, String message)
      Displays an alert dialog with the specified title and message.
      参数:
      title - The title of the alert
      message - The message to display
